name: Jump
storyline: MM-27 Killer is the robot in charge of disinfecting sector 16 of the KUTXTZ industrial complex. As he does every morning, he goes to his extermination tasks, but today he is in for a nasty surprise. After a radiation leak, the insects have mutated and have increased 1000 times in size.
summary: The player controls an electromechanical robot that walks along a brick wall and jumps over it. A line of enemies approaches it from the bottom of the screen in a vertical direction, while the bomb floats horizontally in the center. Enemies can be eliminated by jumping over the wall, which causes a brick to fall. The number of jumps is equal to the number of bricks from the bottom of the wall to the robot.
